refnamediv.refpurpose: An action of which only one in a group can be active

refsynopsisdiv.title: Synopsis

refsect1.title: Properties
refsect1.synopsis: current-value gint : Read / Write group GtkRadioAction : Write value gint : Read / Write

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: A GtkRadioAction is similar to GtkRadioMenuItem. A number of radio actions can be linked together so that only one may be active at any one time.

refsect2.title: GtkRadioAction
refsect2.para: The GtkRadioAction struct contains only private members and should not be accessed directly.

refsect2.title: gtk_radio_action_new ()
refsect2.programlisting: GtkRadioAction* gtk_radio_action_new (const gchar *name, const gchar *label, const gchar *tooltip, const gchar *stock_id, gint value);
refsect2.para: Creates a new GtkRadioAction object. To add the action to a GtkActionGroup and set the accelerator for the action, call gtk_action_group_add_action_with_accel().

listitem.simpara: A unique name for the action
The label displayed in menu items and on buttons
The stock icon to display in widgets representing this action
The value which gtk_radio_action_get_current_value() should return if this action is selected.

refsect2.para: Since 2.4

refsect2.title: gtk_radio_action_get_group ()
refsect2.para: Returns the list representing the radio group for this object. Note that the returned list is only valid until the next change to the group.

listitem.simpara: the list representing the radio group for this object

refsect2.para: Since 2.4

refsect2.title: gtk_radio_action_set_group ()
refsect2.para: Sets the radio group for the radio action object.

listitem.simpara: a list representing a radio group

refsect2.para: Since 2.4

refsect2.title: gtk_radio_action_get_current_value ()
refsect2.para: Obtains the value property of the currently active member of the group to which action belongs.

listitem.simpara: The value of the currently active group member

refsect2.para: Since 2.4

refsect2.title: gtk_radio_action_set_current_value ()
refsect2.para: Sets the currently active group member to the member with value property current_value.
Since 2.10

refsect2.title: The :current-value property
refsect2.para: The value property of the currently active member of the group to which this action belongs.
Default value: 0
Since 2.10

refsect2.title: The :group property
refsect2.para: Sets a new group for a radio action.
Since 2.4

refsect2.title: The :value property
refsect2.para: The value is an arbitrary integer which can be used as a convenient way to determine which action in the group is currently active in an ::activate or ::changed signal handler. See gtk_radio_action_get_current_value() and GtkRadioActionEntry for convenient ways to get and set this property.
Default value: 0
Since 2.4

refsect2.title: The ::changed signal
refsect2.programlisting: void user_function (GtkRadioAction *action, GtkRadioAction *current, gpointer user_data) : Run First / No Recursion
refsect2.para: The ::changed signal is emitted on every member of a radio group when the active member is changed. The signal gets emitted after the ::activate signals for the previous and current active members.

listitem.simpara: the action on which the signal is emitted
the member of actions group which has just been activated
user data set when the signal handler was connected.

refsect2.para: Since 2.4
